description: ROAD is backed by real revenue from BlackRoad OS services, not speculation

infrastructure.description: Real compute, real hosting, real IP

revenue_streams.name: BlackRoad API Access
revenue_streams.pricing: 0.001 ROAD per API call OR $0.01 USD
revenue_streams.backing: Each ROAD spent on API access is burned, reducing supply

revenue_streams.name: AI Inference (Pi Cluster)
revenue_streams.backing: Real compute hardware running real models

revenue_streams.name: Agent Identity Registration
revenue_streams.pricing: 1 ROAD per SHA-2048 identity OR $10 USD
revenue_streams.backing: Cryptographic identity on RoadChain, verifiable forever

no_derivatives_policy.description: No futures, options, shorts, swaps, synthetics, or any derivative instrument may be created against ROAD or ROADCOIN
no_derivatives_policy.rationale: Derivatives extract value from holders and create artificial price pressure. ROAD is backed by revenue, not speculation. If you want exposure, buy ROAD. Period.
no_derivatives_policy.penalties: Any exchange listing derivative products against ROAD will be permanently blacklisted from the RoadChain bridge

burn_mechanism.description: ROAD spent on services is burned (removed from supply), not recycled
burn_mechanism.effect: As usage grows, supply shrinks, backing per ROAD increases

valuation_model.description: ROAD is valued like equity — based on projected revenue, not speculation
valuation_model.formula: Value per ROAD = (Annual Revenue / Supply) + (BTC Reserve / Supply)
valuation_model.note: This is how Alexa values things. Not vibes. Cash flow.

reserve_policy.btc_reserve: Maintained as emergency liquidity, not primary backing
reserve_policy.transparency: All revenue and burns published on-chain in real-time

total_road_burned_note: Reconciled from burns.jsonl (1087 AI_COMPUTE_BURN entries). Previous value was stale.
millennium_note: Burns carry Millennium Prize Problem multipliers (P vs NP, Riemann, Yang-Mills, Navier-Stokes, Hodge, BSD, Poincare). Combined x1.000-1.035.
